input.sentences: the inside of the glass building was beautiful with different colors .
the moon art work was a brilliant blue .
the walkway near the water was landscaped nicely .
the sun was reflecting of the ocean nicely .
the bridge was lit up a bright blue in the night .
output.sentences: Before stepping outside I admited the glass inside the atrium with it's beautiful array of rainbow colors.
This glass moon shone a brilliant blue as the sun shined on the building.
The nicely laid out walkway near the water provided a perfect place for my evening stroll.
I paused to watch the sun set reflecting in the calm ocean as it dropped below the horizon.
As the dark of night descended, the bridge lit up with bright lights.
